code: create_execute_test_xml(   model_id,   met,   site_id,   start_date,   end_date,   dbfiles_folder,   user_id,   output_folder = "batch_test_output",   pecan_path = getwd(),   pft = NULL,   ensemble_size = 1,   sensitivity_variable = "NPP",   sensitivity = FALSE,   db_bety_username = NULL,   db_bety_password = NULL,   db_bety_hostname = NULL,   db_bety_port = NULL,   db_bety_driver = "Postgres" )

title: Create a PEcAn XML file and use it to run a PEcAn workflow — create_execute_test_xml
text: model_id (numeric) Model ID (`models` table) met (character) Name meteorology input source (e.g. `"CRUNCEP"`) site_id (numeric) Site ID (`sites` table) start_date (character date) Run start date end_date (character date) Run end date dbfiles_folder (character) Path `dbfiles` directory user_id (numeric) User ID associate workflow output_folder (character) Path root directory storing outputs. Default = `"batch_test_output"` pecan_path (character) Path PEcAn source code. Default current working directory. pft (character) Name PFT run. `NULL` (default), use first PFT BETY associated model. ensemble_size (numeric) Number ensembles run. Default = 1. sensitivity_variable (character) Variable performing sensitivity analysis. Default = `"NPP"` sensitivity (logical) Whether perform sensitivity analysis (default = `FALSE`) db_bety_username, db_bety_password, db_bety_hostname, db_bety_port (character) BETY database connection options. Default values pulled `<pecan_path>/web/config.php`. db_bety_driver (character) BETY database connection driver (default = `"Postgres"`)

PEcAn.workflow 1.10.0
text: Breaking: Ensemble runs now use shared input samples across sites instead independent sampling per site. run.write.configs() now two new required args ensemble.size input_design, removes ens.sample.method (#3535, #3612). runModule.run.write.configs() new arg input_design, default NULL meaning generate one internally (#3535).

title: PEcAn.workflow 1.9.0
text: PEcAn.workflow now distributed BSD 3-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license. now easier run workflow without connection PEcAn database setting settings$database$bety$write FALSE (undefining entirely), obvious cost runs set way recorded database (@yinghaoSunn, #3398). Improved handling modellauncher start_model_runs(), including support array runs via settings like <qsub.extra>-t 1-@NJOBS@</qsub.extra>.

title: PEcAn.workflow 1.8.0
